name: Hammer and Die (GMTK 2022)
description:
Created for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam, Hammer and Die is definitely one of those cases of biting off more than you can chew. It's a small, pretty unpolished top down Old Western wave shooter that features a fairly interesting core mechanic at it's heart, that being a magic revolver which changes it's ammo type and ammo count randomly with each reload. Made by 4 people managing different sides of the project (Programming/Tech, UI, VFX, and Music) it was a fun collaborative challenge and an interesting first participation in a Game Jam! We originally wanted to have much more complete visuals, a more roguelike layout dungeon generation layout and a boss fight, but time is not a very good friend of ambition. We hope you can get some enjoyment out of this little project!

Pointers:

The red D6 on the hammer represents your health

The icons on the left side barrel reel represent the current Ammo Type you have

The numbers on the right side barrel reel represent your Ammo Count 

New waves of enemies spawn several times a minute

Kill 100 Enemies to win!
